xxl.connectivity.colt
Class ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper

java.lang.Object
  xxl.connectivity.colt.ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiscreteRandomWrapper
public class ColtDiscreteRandomWrapper
extends Object
implements DiscreteRandomWrapper

This class provides a wrapper for using any random element given from the colt library with xxl. If no random engine is given the Mersenne Twiseter PRNG will be used. Furthermore, this wrapper enables the user to assign a discrete distribution the generated random numbers should follow. Per default the discrete uniform distribution of the interval [Integer.MIN_VALUE, Integer_MAXVALUE] is used.

          This class uses the continuous uniform distribution shipped with colt to provide a discrete uniform distribution.

nextInt

public int nextInt()
Computes the next element of the given distribution. If no distribution is given the discrete uniform distribution is used.
